name: 孫郁琪
objective: This course guides students to develop their English conversation, reading, and logical thinking skills. Students will engage in presentations and discussions on a variety of issues from the selected texts. They are also encouraged to critically examine these issues and relate them to their own lives.
schedule: The course outline will be provided on the first day of class.
scorePolicy:
Attendance & Participation: 40%
Group Presentation: 10%
Midterm & Final Papers: 50%
